The biggest ideological gap I've seen btwn people discussing Bitcoin isn't fiat vs. cryptocurrency, tokens vs sound money, or anything like that.

It's between people who think goal is "cashing out" if BTC moons in USD vs. those who think "cashing out" means trading USD for BTC.
